Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、ガジュマでもヒューマでもないものって、 何だと思う？
Entry.EnglishText: So, what would something that's not Huma or a Gajuma be?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだ、それ？ ナゾナゾか？
Entry.EnglishText: What's that supposed to be? Is this some sort of riddle?
Hey... You're not talking about me, are you?

Entry.JapaneseText: え？ そうじゃないヨ！ ハーフでも……<Yellow>ヒト<White>でもないもの……
Entry.EnglishText: Huh? That's not what I meant! Something that's not a Half... and isn't <Yellow>Human<White> either...

Entry.JapaneseText: わかった！ バイラスだ！
Entry.EnglishText: I got it! It's a Birus!

Entry.JapaneseText: そうか……そうだね……バイラス、か…… ボクは……バイラスみたいなものなのかも……
Entry.EnglishText: I see... That's right... A Birus, huh... I'm... something like a Birus...

Entry.JapaneseText: ううん、なんでもないヨ！
